abstract: Stocks drop, affected by sell-off in energy companies.
lead_paragraph: Stocks fell as oil prices headed lower, and investors focused on company earnings from retailers, restaurant chains and other companies.
snippet: Stocks fell as oil prices headed lower, and investors focused on company earnings from retailers, restaurant chains and other companies....

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Lower, Pulled Down by Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Sell-Off in Energy Companies Drags Wall Street Lower
